title: Who are some celebrities one can write a letter to and expect a response from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Darren Hayes might respond to you on Twitter if you say something to catch his attention. He loves his fans and tries to respond to them when he can. Taylor Swift used to respond to her fans on MySpace, but then she got super popular and doesn’t have as much time. She still loves her fans though. So yeah, I think Darren is the one you would have the best chance of getting a response from, most likely on twitter.

It depends on how much of a tear-jerking letter you can write. Most celebrities do not receieve or get to see their fan mail, but if you make it sound like you’re dying, and meeting them would make your life complete, you might get a phone call or they may come look you up, but if you aren’t really that bad off, you run the risk of having them post something negative about you on social media, and that would not be a good thing. Even if you do write a celebrity, don’t expect them to respond because they probably won’t, however, like I’ve stated previously, if you can convince the people that read the celebrity’s fan mail with a good sob story or convince them in some way that you need to meet them, it’s possible. Not likely, but possible.
